pr_title: Send IntelliJ component background color to devtools

timeline.message: Send IntelliJ component background color to devtools

timeline.bodyText: This color doesn't seem like quite the one we want as it is a bit grey. Taking a screenshot, the background color in a window such as the code editor or the dart analysis window in the light theme is 0xffffff.
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: This is actually the dark mode color, I've figured out how to get the color from IntelliJ's defaults and light mode is indeed 0xffffff. Do you care about the test value?
replies.author: helin24

replies.bodyText: would be nice to test light mode as well if that is easy.
replies.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: It's not very meaningful since the hex code is passed into the function, but it's certainly easy!
replies.author: helin24

timeline.message: Remove redundant color creation and add white test
